name: A Sheep's Dilemma
description:
You are a sheep. You have a dilemma. You do as sheep do and beep your problems away. As you explore a dried-up barren wasteland of a once flourishing pasture in search of the last green patch of grass, discover what it truly means to be a sheep with a dilemma.

Beep WASD to move

When in doubt, beep SPACE to interact
